item.title: Installation on Linux (short version)
item.description: Installation on Linux (short version) This page shortly explains how to build and install BornAgain from source on Linux systems. Install third party software Compiler with full C++-14 support (i.e. gcc>= 5.0) cmake (>= 3.14) boost library (>= 1.60) fftw3 library (>= 3.3.1) gsl (GNU scientific library, >= 1.15) libtiff library (>=4.0.2) python3, python3-devel, python3-numpy-devel, python3-matplotlib Qt5 (>=5.11) Get the source Download the BornAgain source tarball or use the following git repository
